author: cnbc.com
title: Brunswick Bancorp Reports Quarter Ending March 31, 2018 Earnings
text:
NEW BRUNSWICK, N.J.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Brunswick Bancorp (OTCBB:BRBW):
